oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Shoe repair ad
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Claiming Space
Business Districts
Advertisements; African American business enterprises
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Advertisement for W.S. Beagle, "the only colored shoe repair shop in Murfreesboro."
This advertisement is for a shoe-repair shop owned by Mr. Beagle and located in one of the African American business districts in Murfreesboro.
